scripts.____preinstall: rm -rf node_modules/_pnbi-base && rm -rf node_modules/pnbi-base && mkdir -p node_modules/_pnbi-base && cd node_modules/_pnbi-base && git init && git config core.sparsecheckout true && echo core4/webapps/pnbi-base/ >> .git/info/sparse-checkout && git remote add -f origin https://github.com/plan-net/core4.git && git fetch --depth 1 origin develop && git checkout develop && cd ../../ && cp -R node_modules/_pnbi-base/core4/webapps/pnbi-base node_modules/pnbi-base && rm -rf node_modules/_pnbi-base
